name: DiNAsaur Time
description:
You're a mad scientist! Mix your viles containing different liquids to create weird creatures, and maybe in the end you can create your ultimate pet: A DiNAsaur!

(Excerpt from Lab Notebook):
Man I really need a pet... I got some plasmids recently, plasmids have DNA that I can use to create a dinosaur. Or try.

This game was made for the GBG Science Jam 2022, which was a game jam where we got paired together with a scientist and made a game based on that scientist's work.

Scientist and Game Design: Paulo Gonçalves Teixeira
3D Artist: Jadith Nicole Bruzenak
Sound Designer: kbrecordzz
Developer: Christian Chaux

Dutch Translation: TheIndra
Spanish and German Translation: Masaya-jkl
